'''Jef Murray''' ([[17 March]] [[1960]] - [[3 August]] [[2015]]), employed by the Pitts Theology Library of [[Wikipedia:Emory University|Emory University]] in Atlanta, has painted and sketched numerous [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-related images for publications such as the [[Amon Hen (journal)|''Amon Hen'' journal]], ''[[Parma Nölé]]'', and the [[Mallorn (journal)|''Mallorn'' journal]]. He has also had Tolkien-related work featured in the ''St. Austin Review'', a journal of Catholic culture.

In 2009, Murray made the illustrations for [[Hilary Tolkien]]'s ''[[Black & White Ogre Country]]''.
